page.title: 10PUBLIC & COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content: EDUCATION:Playgroup sited Cantilupe Rd,may be closed by Council -cater for 150+ children 0-5yrs;9assistants & vol parent help.Weston School 81 pupils, 5-11yrs;3teachers.Secondary:lower site onRyefield Rd 1st/2nd yrs,upper school Overross- 1297 pupils,81 teachers,10 aux.staff. Further Ed:4 sites,600 stu- dents.Costs65p/hr+20p enrolment.SOCIAL SERVICES:Cantilupe Rd;3 full & 3 part time social workers,20home helps.Serv- ices offered to: elderly daycare,home help,home admittances,child fostering, adoption,child minding. Help handicap- ped at Voluntary Day Centre(Mon,Tues, Thurs) in Station St.Elderly homes - 1 short-stay day care 9-bedded unit;3res idential homes - 39 residents. WRVS: district office Cantilupe Rd,offering meals-on-wheels,old peoples club,shop- ping for housebound,laundry service, domicilliary care & clothing store.
